name: Gold Pro Curling Wand, 1
about: What it is:A wand that creates long-lasting, beautiful curls—without compromising the health of your hair..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Has a 60-minute automatic shutoff.What Else You Need to Know:Bio Ionic is the professional’s choice for styling tools. The improved Gold Pro range utilizes moisturizing heat technology, allowing your hair to stay conditioned as you style.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Wrap small sections of hair around one-inch barrel of curling wand, hold for a few seconds, then release for beautifully defined curls that effortlessly elevate your style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Would’ve loved it if it didn’t break within a few uses
